definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Am 2:4 lie, falsehood, deceptive thing;—abs. ´[[כ]] Ho 12:2 + 19 t.; pl. abs. [[כְּזׇבִים]] Ju Jdg 16:10 + 9 t.; sf. [[כִּזְבֵיהֶם]] Am 2:4; —lie, falsehood, c. [[דִּבֶּר]] Ju Jdg 16:10, Jdg 16:13, Ho 7:13, Zep 3:13, Da 11:27, Ps 5:7, Ps 58:4, so Ez Eze 13:8 Co (by transp. ´[[כ]] with [[שָׁוְא]], cf. v:Eze 13:6, v:Eze 13:7, v:Eze 13:9); c. [[יׇפִיחַ]] (in Pr) Pr 6:19, Pr 14:5, Pr 14:25, Pr 19:5, Pr 19:9; of false prophecies (divinations) c. [[אָמַר]], ´[[מִקְסַם כ]] Ez Eze 13:7; c. [[קָסַם]] v:Eze 13:9, Eze 21:34, Eze 22:28 + Eze 13:6 LXX Co (´[[קָסוֹם כ]], for MT ´[[קֶסֶם כ]]); c. [[שָׁמַע]] Eze 13:19, [[בִּקֵּשׁ]] Ps 4:3; c. [[רָחָה]] delight in Ps 62:5; so in the phr. ´[[דְּבַר־כ]] Pr 30:8, ´[[אִישׁ כ]] Pr 19:22 = liar, [[עֵד כְּזׇבִים]] Pr 21:28 = false witness; of idols. as a lie (res ementita) Am 2:4, so prob. ´[[שָׂטֵי כ]] those turning aside to a lie Ps 40:5 (cf. [[אָוֶן]], [[אֱלִיל]], [[הֶבֶל]], [[שֶׁקֶר]]); then of empty human pretensions [[וׇשׁׂד יַרְבֶּה]] ´[[כ]] Ho 12:2, Is 28:15 (‖[[שֶׁקֶר]]), v:Is 28:17 (´[[מַחְסֵה כ]]), Ps 62:10 (‖[[הֶבֶל]]; cf. [[כּׂזֵב]] Ps 116:11); [[לֶחֶם כְּזׇבִים]] Pr 23:3 = deceptive (disappointing) bread.
